Developer Terms of Use
des: If you want to relax and have fun you should have this exciting sports trivia games skill app. It brings you different sports question ranging from easy to very hard ones. You just have to choose from the list of multi choices answers and if you get it right you got points.Enjoy this game.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
